summary: Told from the male perspective, the story of a couple trying to reclaim the life and love they once knew and pick up the pieces of a past that may be too far gone.

keywords: break up|new york city|suicide attempt|bar owner|death of child
title: La desaparición de Eleanor Rigby: Él
